entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet new blazorwasm --exclude-launch-settings` doesn't exclude launchsettings.json #42331
  • Open `Index.razor` by default in `blazorserver`, `blazorwasm` templates #42330
  • Introduce package for rendering Blazor components with custom HTML elements #42329
  • Http/2 WebSocket streams do not close gracefully #42328
  • [Discussion] [Breaking change]: Unit testing SignalR Hubs may need updating #42326
    Discussions
  • Avoid creating Context classes when Events have not been set #42325
  • Use Inheritance instead of Composition to Reduce allocation in Request Decompression Middleware #42324
  • Update negotate auth to replace reflection with new public API #42323
  • No default value for missing Enumerable QueryParameter #42320
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Sass support with dotnet watch #42318
    Backlog
  • InternalVisibleTo for not supported extension #42317

Closed

  • TryConvert with custom ContractResolver release date #42259
  • Add general property bag to cookies to support potential new cookie "standards: #39968
    7.0-preview6
  • AsParameters support in MVC #42271
  • Blazor RCL Routing Override in Hosting App throws NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object #42316
  • Unhandled exception in request still logs `Request finished ... 200` #42218
    7.0-preview6
  • Consider setting PersistenceScope for other template options #41637
    7.0-preview6
  • Cleanup ide.host.json files. #41638
    7.0-preview6
  • Visual Studio does not retain 'Do not use top-level statements' check. #41631
    7.0-preview6
  • Allow endpoint filter factories to manipulate endpoint metadata #41722
    7.0-preview6
  • EndpointBuilder.ServiceProvider should be non-nullabe and renamed to ApplicationServices #42137
    7.0-preview6
  • The method `AddPolicyRegistry` is called multiple times, and only the last one takes effect #42321
  • Replace Single(connectionId) with Client(connectionId) and Caller #41994
    7.0-preview6
  • NavigationManager should be able to cancel the navigation request on LocationChanged in Blazor #42285
  • test #42319
  • HTTP/3: Remove non-final h3 ALPNs #35032
    .NET 7 Planning
  • dotnet user-jwts create throws exception if user secrets JSON contains objects #42306
    7.0-preview6
  • dotnet user-jwts create throws exception if launch settings file not found #42304
    7.0-preview6
  • Not possible to call `WebHost.ConfigureAppConfiguration` when a `wwwroot` directory exists #39546
    6.0.x
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.6.22313.7] Blazor Server apps with System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException Error when accessing with https #42224
    7.0-preview6
  • Secrets are not being read from k8s mounted folder - AddKeyPerFile - Core3.1 #42086

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.0-preview6 #42327
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for multi-segment parameters to gRPC JSON transcoding #42315
    area-grpc

Merged

  • [main] Remove more unused Docker files #42248
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Expose cookie extensions, consolidate cookie handling #42119
    area-security, area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • HttpSys log correct statuscode when application throws #42223
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6
  • [Route Groups] Support AddFilter, WithOpenApi and other additive conventions #42195
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, feature-minimal-hosting, 7.0-preview6
  • Cleanup project template ide.host.json files #42311
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview6
  • [SignalR] Replace Single(connectionId) with Client(connectionId) and Caller #42236
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview6
  • Improve missing/malformed file handling in user-jwts #42309
    area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts, 7.0-preview6
  • Remove non-final HTTP/3 ALPN #42290
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Make H2 WebSockets ignore MaxRequestBodySize and MinRequestBodyDataRate #42269
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • Add generic method overloads to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results static class #42176
    area-runtime
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • Empty Blazor Server Project Template #42079
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Empty Blazor WebAssembly Project Template #42215
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • [WIP] Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure
  • Custom HTML elements rendering Blazor components #42314
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Compiler runtime APIs needed for bind:get, bind:set, bind:after #40143
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] Remove more unused Docker files #42247
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Remove old unused Docker files #42246
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Remove old unused Docker files #42245
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Log error when exception occurs during streaming #42283
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • adds kiota to dotnet openapi tool #41928
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix CollectionModelBinder BindSimpleCollection null value handling #42278
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • macOS dev-certs overhaul #42251
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, blog-candidate
